meanings.definition: A person who uses hyperbole excessively.
meanings.sent1: The hyperbolist claimed to have a million reasons to be happy.
meanings.sent2: She is known as a hyperbolist because she always says she has the best day ever.
meanings.sent3: The hyperbolist joked that they could eat a mountain of ice cream in one sitting.
meanings.sent4: His reputation as a hyperbolist soared when he said he could move mountains with his bare hands.
meanings.sent5: The hyperbolist's stories were like fireworks, bursting with exaggerated excitement.

meanings.definition: One who exaggerates or overstates things.
meanings.sent1: As a hyperbolist, he claimed to have a ton of homework every night.
meanings.sent2: The hyperbolist at the party said the cake was bigger than a house.
meanings.sent3: The hyperbolist joked that they could swim across the ocean in a minute.
meanings.sent4: Her reputation as a hyperbolist reached new heights when she said she could outrun a cheetah.
meanings.sent5: The hyperbolist's words were like a colorful painting, always larger than life.
